contentList.content:
The affected entity has missed an Attack Roll while dual-wielding and will suffer an Armour Class penalty and be unable to use off-hand attacks.

Removed when Helped, taking damage, or at the start of the turn.

The affected entity is currently using a twin-weapon fighting stance, and can generate off-hand mirror attacks.

Weapon pairs being dual-wielded suffer an Attack penalty in relation to their weight.
